description: Conflict Area is both a singleplayer and multiplayer game made by 2 developers.

name: Skillsworn
description: Skillsworn is a real time, party-based isometric adventure game. Take on the role of a fresh adventurer and embark on a journey through the wilds of the world. Defeat a variety of dangerous foes and prove that you are not just another bored peasant seeking a thrill.

name: Enchanted Kingdom: Frost Curse - Collector's Edition
description: The King is dead! As his son, it’s up to you to rule the Empire. But any plans for a coronation are quickly thwarted when a frigid foe attacks your realm! A long-lost relative is after your crown, and their dark magic threatens to take the land into an age of cold darkness. Do you have what it takes to defeat them and save your home in time? Find out in this exhilarating Hidden-Object Puzzle adventure!

name: Sphere Game Epic
description: Sphere Game Epic is the newest in the Sphere Game series, with new mechanics and visuals, bringing more challenges to be overcome.

name: Galaxy Drift
description: Galaxy Drift is a high speed isometric racer inspired by classics like F-Zero, Rock n' Roll Racing and RC Pro-Am. Reach astronomical speeds, def the laws of physics as you warp past planets, stars and black holes in an adrenaline fueled race across the galaxy!

name: Potato's Dream
description: A clicker game where you make a potato's dream come true. Will you help it obtain its dream or will it slowly rot away in a bag in a dark kitchen?

name: Cinemoji

name: Cracked Up
description: Cracked Up is a fun puzzle platformer with eggs that can change the way you play!

name: Gunmancer
description: Gunmancer is a science fantasy roguelike top-down shooter. Summon guns as you shoot your way through mysterious randomly generated dungeons full of ancient forbidden magic of guns and dangerous monsters.

description: Follow the emotional story of Ayame Kawasaki, who disappears from the public eye following her mother's suicide. One year later, she's ready to start her life again. Build and develop meaningful connections with those you cherish in this slice-of-life/social simulation game.

name: Murder Hornets

name: JMPR
description: JMPR is a handcrafted unforgiving 2d platformer, or “Meatlike,” made for diehard fans.

name: Valley of Shadow
description: An autobiographical puzzle game. Solve puzzles using classic spells (Light, Force Missile, Fireball) while you explore a dark world full of secrets.

name: Endro

name: Flowcubes

description: Amidst dozens of reports of missing people, mutilated animals, unidentified lights in the sky, strange creatures and odd poltergeist-like activity, 2 FBI agents are sent to investigate a mysterious ranch in order to ascertain the truth. What they uncover becomes a hellish nightmare beyond imagining!

name: Zombie In Town
description: Zombie In Town is an action packed tower defense game in which you play as a boy who tries to defend his town from zombies invasion.

name: Between Time: Escape Room
description: You are going to steal a time machine. In this escape room, you have to travel through time, explore mysterious places and solve puzzles to get priceless treasures. Will you be able to make it back alive?

name: Saphyro
description: Saphyro - is a casual game where your task is to collect white cubes, for which you get points. The difficulty is that you need to dodge the colored platforms that randomly appear on the playing field and the cube, which you control constantly in motion. And how many points can you collect?

name: Afterlife Beans
description: You are a bean that is about to go to the after life but someone won't let you to do that! find out who it is in this game! collect coins, shoot enemies and terrible puns are awaiting you, so what are you waiting for? join the bean in afterlife beans.

name: Born Into Fear
description: Born Into Fear is a first-person horror game set in an evacuated neighborhood. You'll have to solve puzzles and avoid enemies to destroy the evil Buffer.

name: 50 Waves Hero
description: It's a defense game that blocks 50 waves. But Hero has just woken up from the seal and is powerless. So you have to protect your castle while growing up your warrior.

name: Raven's Hike

name: Revenger
description: A fast-paced, tough as nails first-person shooter evocative of the direct-to-video action flicks of the 1980's, Revenger is a short, but memorable experience about one man's hunt to rescue his daughter, and kill everyone responsible for her kidnapping.

name: Arcaduis

name: Speed Mazing
description: Exciting "racing" party game for up to 4 players. Quick gameplay loop, hundreds of maps and eye-catching visuals. Also included is a challenging time attack mode for single player.

name: Centauri Dominion

name: Gun Duel

name: Pig Skater Simulator
description: You are a pig, and not a meat! Jump on a skateboard and do the trick! Create some chaos and gather pearls, this game will let you immerse with no rest.

name: Azlan: Rise of the Burlpups

Get ready for massive tower defense battles in VR as AZLAN defends Zalolo Land from total ruin. With a vast arsenal of upgradable cannons, arrows, and crystal towers at your command, can your skill & craft save Zalolo from Rise of the...

You will Plan time and courses for her, bring her into contact with various roles, and raise her up. The daughter's future and the ending of the volcano country depends on each of your choices.

name: SudoKats
description: Cats are very demanding and peculiar animals. Use your sudoku skill to help them feel one of a kind.

name: The Journey of AutUmn
description: The Journey of AutUmn - A classic point-and-click adventure game with completely hand-painted graphics. The player controls an android that crashes during its mission through a variety of lovingly designed environments and solves classic inventory puzzles.

name: Karma Flow 2: Tears of a Ghost
description: Karma Flow 2: Tears of a Ghost is a Noir Action Stealth game which focuses on narrative and freedom of action. Play as Florien Kealborn and uncover the truth in a game that lets you carry out missions in a way that most suits your own playstyle, making you plan things out and act as you wish.

name: Flower in the Snow: Resurrection
description: What is going to be acted before you is——Blossom in the shackles, but deep down in your bone, suspension and romantic.

name: All Dream Long A Flower Storm

name: Corona Frustration Elimination
description: Corona plunged the world into chaos in 2020. That sparked anger and frustration. Here you can let your frustration run free and Corona really express your opinion!

name: Coronavirus: Nano Force
description: A fast-paced arcade shooter where you pilot a nano-ship in the fight against the Coronavirus. Grab powerups to upgrade your weapons and eliminate the virus infection.

name: Covid-19: Corona Clicker
description: Develop a vaccine for Covid-19 and save the world from pandemic! Covid-19 - Corona Clicker is a game for PC. Get higher virus resistance and take strategic measures for the country, such as airport closures or healthcare support.

name: Corona Simulator: Savior Edition
description: The Savior Edition, includes cool new features, like premium UI themes, more game events, and a new virus strain. Additionally, 20% of the revenue made with this Edition will get donated to the WHO COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund.

name: Schoolmates: The Mystery of the Magical Bracelet
description: Long ago, a dark order of mages decided to wreak havoc upon the land but was kept at bay by another group known as the Selena order. Help the three young apprentices, Flex, Eva and Blondie to defeat a powerful mage in this incredible hidden object and point & click adventure!

name: Among School Girls
description: Among School Girls is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: High School of Memories

name: Aske
description: A first person shooter that sets you far away, near death.

name: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel
description: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel is a surgery simulation visual novel. Take on the role of an ace surgeon in training at the world's greatest hospital. Operate on patients with a variety of conditions. Befriend and romance a colorful cast of doctors. Save lives and melt hearts.

name: Pandemic Heart
description: Pandemic Heart is a relaxing visual novel game with multiple endings that set about a wild story of love in the Pandemic or the Outbreak.

name: Start! Heart Thief
description: Our heroine ruby is an orphan, Every morning, she goes out to explore the secret island of God Every night, she put on her nightdress

name: Hearts of Iron IV: Allied Armor Pack
description: Bust through the Ardennes or encircle the Axis in style with this new cosmetic pack for Hearts of Iron IV . Including tanks previously only available in the Colonel Edition, this pack adds a number of new armored and tracked vehicles for the Allies and Comintern powers.

name: Euro Truck Simulator 2: Heart of Russia
description:
Explore the heart of Russia, Moscow, and beyond. Feel the spirit of Russian history driving through centuries-old cities. Get lost in the sea of trees and open plains.

As a direct result to Russia's invasion of Ukraine, SCS Software announced its decision to not go through with the release of Heart of Russia DLC.

name: Songbringer: The Trial of Ren
description: Discover the whereabouts of the mysterious Ren and undertake his trial with the aim of achieving spiritual ascension.

name: The Song of Survivors
description: The Song of Survivors is a free-to-play massively-cooperative bullet-hell style MMORPG. If you die, a new hero reborn who carries your legacy onto your next adventure!!

name: Boxing Babes: Sexy Fight Hentai Anime Girls
description: BOXING BABES: Sexy Fight Hentai Anime GirlsThe Action Echii Hentai Boxing Game its released on PC! Box, Customize, Flirt and Fight.

name: Fight the Landlord
description: A game of competition and card collection.Use your skills and items to win the game!The game has single-player mode and online mode.

name: Light Fighter
description: Light Fighter is an arcade survival game and scoring.
